products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Linen Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux pvc blackout linen roller blind. Made to measure from 10.04 with free uk mainland delivery. This roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Stylish & contemporay blackout linen is the dream nuetral for your home or office. Give your bathroom or kitchen a modern makeover with the unilux pvc blackout roller blind. This roller blind is made from moisture resistant pvc and is guaranteed to give your space a fresh feel thanks to its contemporary design and crisp white finish. In addition, the blackout material will provide the required peace and privacy.
 
 Product id: sdb-rbx2385 fabric colour: linen material: fiberglass core laminated with pvc layered coating lining: colour match backing - see sample headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix   control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes

products.title: Unilux PVC Blackout Cream Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Unilux pvc blackout cream electric roller blind in cream. Made to measure from 135.74 with free uk mainland delivery. This electric roller blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
A durable, moisture resistant and long lasting collection that is available in a range of stunning shades. 
 
This cream roller blind is very durable and the perfect choice for your bathroom as it is moisture resistant and will go with any existing decor due to the neutral tone of the fabric.The electric aspect of this blind means it is easy to use and perfect for difficult to reach windows.
